import React, { Component } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { DataContext } from "./Context" import "./Header.css" import logo from "../logo.png" import Cart from "./Cart" import cartimg from "../cartimg.png" class Header extends Component { static contextType = DataContext state = { modalIsOpen: false } render() { const { categories, updateCurrency, currentCurrency } = this.context const { modalIsOpen } = this.state return (
{categories.map(({ name }) => (
  • {name}
))}
this.setState({ modalIsOpen: !modalIsOpen })} /> {modalIsOpen &&
this.setState({ modalIsOpen: false })}>
event.stopPropagation()} >
My Bag
Total:
}
) } } export default Header
